description:
Everyone has more fun when they're comfortable. This youth-sized saddle has a raised tail and dropped nose to help keep the rider in a good riding position, and soft foam padding that keeps bums happy on long rides.

  • Contoured neutral shape and generous padding relieves pressure for comfortable movement on the seat
  • Front and rear edge guards protect saddle during tumbles
  • Includes traditional 7/8in. saddle clamp for compatibility with older seatposts without an integrated clamp
name: 49N Perch Saddle - Youths
